author: dion
msg: - Allow docbook-simple to markup maven documentation.
- If the maven.src.docbook-simple property points to a valid directory, the docbook-simple
target is called as part of docs processing
- Currently this functionality is experimental, and the stylesheet that does
the processing is known to have some 'issues'

author: dion
msg: Change to use new snapshot of commons-io
